question:
####UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
When the Corp plays Success, can they split the advancements among more than one card?
answer:
No.

If [Jemison Astronautics](/en/card/12016) plays Success, which goes first? Jemison or Success?

text_ruling: If the Corp is playing [Weyland Consortium: Built to Last](30059) and uses [Success](12078) to advance a card multiple times at once, how many credits do they gain? >Success advances its target multiple times in sequence, not simultaneously. Only the first advancement can meet [Weyland Consortium: Built to Last](30059)'s trigger condition, so the Corp can gain 2.
